Air Purification: Add an air purification system to the air conditioner to remove allergens, pollutants, and odors from the air.
Voice Control: Add voice control functionality to the air conditioner, allowing users to control the temperature, fan speed, and other settings using their voice.
Energy-efficient: Use energy-efficient technology such as a variable frequency drive (VFD) to optimize the air conditioner's energy usage.
Self-cleaning: Incorporate a self-cleaning feature to the air conditioner to prevent the buildup of dirt and dust on the coils.
Mobile App: Develop a mobile app that allows users to control the air conditioner remotely, monitor energy usage, and receive alerts for maintenance and filter replacements.
